name: iPhone 13 Pro Max
description: Apple's iPhone 13 Pro Max offers a stunning 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, triple cameras, and A15 Bionic chip for exceptional performance.

name: iPhone 14 Pro
description: The iPhone 14 Pro introduces Dynamic Island, always-on display, and the powerful A16 Bionic chip.

name: Galaxy S23
description: Samsung Galaxy S23  offers a foldable design with a 7.6-inch AMOLED screen, S Pen support, and Snapdragon 888.

name: iPhone 12
description: iPhone 12 offers a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A14 Bionic chip, and ceramic shield for better durability.

name: iPhone SE (2022)
description: The compact iPhone SE features the A15 Bionic chip, 5G support, and Touch ID in a classic design.

name: iPhone 11
description: iPhone 11 combines dual cameras, Liquid Retina HD display, and A13 Bionic for excellent performance.

name: Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra comes with a 6.8-inch AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and 200MP camera.
